item.description:
GitHub-hosted larger runners with Azure private networking (Azure VNET-injection) now display detailed network diagnostics when connectivity issues occur. Instead of generic pool errors, you’ll see: Per-endpoint visibility: Drill down into…

The post Better diagnostics for VNET injected runners and required self-hosted runner upgrades appeared first on The GitHub Blog.

GitHub Enterprise Server (GHES) 3.19 enhances deployment efficiency, monitoring capabilities, code security, and policy management. Here are a few highlights in the 3.19 release: An improved and more intuitive flow…

The GitHub MCP Server now comes with support for tool-specific configuration, allowing you to customize the server to your needs and minimize context window usage. Simply use the new X-MCP-Tools…

The post The GitHub MCP Server adds support for tool-specific configuration, and more appeared first on The GitHub Blog.
